pkgmetadata.longdescription: CCXT – CryptoCurrency eXchange Trading Library==============================================Oops!Looking for CCXT? You've mistyped the name. Bad guys could exploit this, providing a fake version of CCXT here, but we always think a step forward :) So here's the original version you've might been looking for: https://www.npmjs.com/package/ccxtHave a nice day!– CCXT Dev Team
